description.value:
>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.unJ8E4IikZUxT7x3]{Temporal Anomalies (Su)}

Occasionally, you can manifest the echoes of past memories into a boon for a present situation. Recalling now-overcome terrors of the past, you regain power. Once per day, you can use a @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.BOut7Wi1oWcnsEf3]{paradox} to regain a spent spell slot; the spell slot must be of a level equal to or lower than one third of the paradox used.

You must know the @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.oVf1FnpVNjz3PxNg]{spell rewind} temporal anomaly to learn this temporal anomaly.
